properties.entry: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , JOIN_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEMBER_TYPE , WRITE_ACTIVE , USER_CATE , POINT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND MEMBER_TYPE != 2

INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_ID , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , USER_CATE , JOIN_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEMBER_TYPE , WRITE_ACTIVE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
UPDATE USER_INFO SET NICKNAME = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , USER_CATE = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT USER_ID , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , JOIN_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MEMBER_TYPE , USER_CATE , POINT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET MEMBER_TYPE = 2 WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_CATE = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET POINT = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET REPORTED = REPORTED + 1 WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT REPORTED_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = ?)
UPDATE USER_INFO SET POINT = POINT + ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?

UPDATE USER_INFO SET POINT = POINT + (SELECT CHALL_PAYMENT FROM CHALL WHERE CHALL_NO = ?) , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND CHALL_STATUS !=0)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE MEMBER_TYPE = 1 AND TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM dual)
